campaigns.name: CE: Application Purchase Home Search Follow Up - Client
campaigns.length:
CE: Application Purchase Home Search Follow Up - Client
This campaign will provide potential borrowers who have completed an application with home buying tips to keep you top of mind.

campaigns.name: CE: Application Purchase Home Search Follow Up - Self Alerts
campaigns.length:
CE: Application Purchase Home Search Follow Up - Self Alerts
This campaigns contains self alerts to keep you notified where potential borrowers are on the "Application Purchase Home Search Follow Up - Clients" campaign.

campaigns.name: CE: Application Refinance Follow Up - Client
campaigns.length:
CE: Application Refinance Follow Up - Client
This campaign will provide potential borrowers who have completed an application with refinance tips to keep you top of mind.

campaigns.name: CE: Application Refinance Follow Up - Self Alerts
campaigns.length:
CE: Application Refinance Follow Up - Self Alerts
This campaign will keep you updated on where your potential borrowers are at in the "Application Refinance Follow Up - Clients" campaign.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: Application Purchase Found Home Follow up - Client
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: Application Purchase Found Home Follow up - Client
This campaign will provide potential borrowers who've found a home with purchasing tips to keep you top of mind, and nudge them towards completing their digital 1003 application.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: Application Purchase Found Home Follow up - Self Alerts
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: Application Purchase Found Home Follow up - Self Alerts
This campaign will alert you where your potential borrower is in the "Application Purchase Found Home Follow Up - Client" campaign

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: New Lead Follow-Up
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: New Lead Follow-Up
This campaign is to follow-up with your new leads. Great place to add a text message step using the BNTouch Voice Module.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: New Lead from Partner (Co-Branded)
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: New Lead from Partner (Co-Branded)
This campaign is designed for use with real estate agents and allows you to manage their marketing for prospective home buyers. This campaign will drip marketing emails on any lead for 55 days and will work in conjunction with a web form that you can build and give to your real estate agent. Before implementing this campaign, make sure you edit the co-branded stationery that comes with this campaign.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: New Referral From Loan Portal
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: New Referral From Loan Portal
This campaign will introduce yourself and mortgage business to a new referral submitted to a loan portal by one of your past borrowers. This campaign will also automatically remind you to call this new referral.

campaigns.name: CE: Customizable Portal Invite For Borrowers
campaigns.length:
CE: Customizable Portal Invite For Borrowers
This is a one step email to invite your clients and partners to access web portals and download mobile applications. Unlike the quick link in a record this can be customized and triggered to allow for your own marketing touch!

campaigns.name: CE: First Time Home Buyers - Mortgage Process
campaigns.length:
CE: First Time Home Buyers - Mortgage Process
This campaign is designed to educate First Time Home Buyers on the mortgage process. This campaign runs for two months (with excluded weekends) and covers subjects like "How Much Can I afford?", "Fixed vs. ARM", "Why use Real Estate Broker" etc.

campaigns.name: CE: Prospect (Pre-Application) Purchase Follow Up - Client
campaigns.length:
CE: Prospect (Pre-Application) Purchase Follow Up - Client
This campaign will provide potential borrowers with purchasing tips to keep you top of mind, and nudge them towards completing their digital 1003 application.

campaigns.name: CE: Prospect (Pre-Application) Purchase Follow Up - Self Alerts
campaigns.length:
CE: Prospect (Pre-Application) Purchase Follow Up - Self Alerts
This campaign will update you on where potential borrowers are in the "Prospect (Pre-Application) Purchase Follow Up - Client" campaign.

campaigns.name: CE: Prospect (Pre-Application) Refinance Follow Up - Client
campaigns.length:
CE: Prospect (Pre-Application) Refinance Follow Up - Client
This campaign will provide potential borrowers with refinance tips to keep you top of mind, and nudge them towards completing their digital 1003 application.

campaigns.name: CE: Prospect (Pre-Application) Refinance Follow Up - Self Alerts
campaigns.length:
CE: Prospect (Pre-Application) Refinance Follow Up - Self Alerts
This campaign will update you on where potential borrowers are in the "Prospect (Pre-Application) Refinance Follow Up - Clients" campaign.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Application Completed v2
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Application Completed v2
This campaign will notify your borrowers/agents that their application is officially completed.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Cleared to Close v2
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Cleared to Close v2
This campaign will notify your borrowers (and also partners) that their loan is Clear to Close.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Final Docs Ready v2
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Final Docs Ready v2
This campaign will notify your borrowers (and agents) when their final documents are ready

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Loan Approved v2
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Loan Approved v2
Email going to clients, self, colleagues letting them know the status of their file. This campaign will notify and congratulate your borrower (and any appropriate partners) when their loan has been approved.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Loan Approved With Conditions v2
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Loan Approved With Conditions v2
This campaign will notify your borrower (and loan partners) that their loan is conditionally approved.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Loan Submitted to Processing v2
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Loan Submitted to Processing v2
This campaign will notify your borrower (and appropriate partners) that their loan has been submitted into processing.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Loan Submitted to Underwriting v2
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: In-Processing - Loan Submitted to Underwriting v2
This campaign will let your borrower (and the appropriate partners) know that their loan is in underwriting.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: Post Funded Follow-Up
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: Post Funded Follow-Up
This campaign keeps you top of mind with clients once their loan is funded.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: Previously Funded Follow-Up
campaigns.length:
CE: BNTouch: Previously Funded Follow-Up
This is a follow-up campaign for your funded clients who funded their loan with you in the past year before you started using BNTouch.

campaigns.name: CE: BNTouch: Newsletter
campaigns.length:

The BNTouch Newsletter is meant to be distributed to your borrowers and partners each month.
